hero.title: Services
hero.subtitle: Simple formats. Clear agreements. You lead the topic; we partner with presence and curiosity.

items.title: 1:1 coaching
items.description: 50–60 minutes. You set the agenda. We co-create goals and reflective experiments.

items.title: Small-group clinics
items.description: Focused clinics—interviews, UK workplace norms, transitions. Shared learning without unsolicited advice.

commitments.title: What we commit to
items: ICF ethics, clear boundaries and informed consent
Non-directive partnership; you retain choice and responsibility
Confidentiality within legal and safeguarding limits
Regular review of aims, pace and usefulness

boundaries.title: What we do not do
items: Legal, immigration, medical or financial advice

practicalities.title: Practicalities
items: Online, UK time zone. Session notes are light and client-owned.
Pricing is shared after the intro chat once scope is clear.
We may use supervision; identifying details are protected.
